text:
Apache 2.0.48 PHP4.3.4 
 
<VirtualHost 195.195.195.195> 
 ServerName www.foo.com 
 ..... 
 php_flag magic_quotes_gpc off 
 php_value include_path /www/foo/htdocs/include 
 php_value auto_prepend_file foo.php 
 php_admin_value safe_mode off 
 
</VirtualHost> 
 
<VirtualHost 195.195.195.195> 
 ServerName www.foo1.com 
 ... 
</VirtualHost> 
 
foo1.com loads /www/foo/htdocs/include/foo.php 
But I have no php_value entry in this VirtualHost section. 
 
I hope it's not my config prob.
creator: sts@gmx.de
